EmailTemplate.name: 201906_Americas_SpiritAero_PrimusElite_MC.201906_Americas_Email3_SpiritAero_Du87
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t Miss Your Chance to Save $35K Per DU-875 Display Unit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell has teamed up with Spirit Aeronautics to offer special incentives to operators who upgrade their obsolete DU-870 display units to the DU-875/885 display unit.
Through December 31, save $35,000 per display unit thanks to a special trade-in program. Plus, as an added incentive, you’ll receive a $2,500 discount on your first year of the Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics (formally known as HAPP) for each DU-875/885 purchased.
To take advantage of these special offers, contact Spirit Aeronautics today at 614-333-8540 <tel:614-333-8540> or online by clicking below and filling out the form.
CONTACT SPIRIT AERONAUTICS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/three-options-for-upgrading-to-primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_spiritaero_pe&utm_content=customer+form+fill]]>
